FuncDef: The reset erps statistics command clears packet statistics in an ERPS ring.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears packet statistics in a specific ERPS ring.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before traffic statistics on a specific interface within a certain period is collected, the existing traffic statistics of this interface needs to be cleared. Running the reset erps statistics command ensures that existing packet statistics in the ERPS ring can be cleared.
Prerequisites
ERPS rings have already been created, and interfaces have already been added on specified ERPS rings.
Precautions
After the reset erps statistics command is run, packet statistics in the ERPS ring are cleared and cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when running this command.
